amendment.description: To provide for activities relating to the centennial of the National Park System.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3309 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3309 proposed by Senator Murkowski for Senator Portman to Amendment SA 2953.
